description:
Grippy brakes shoes optimized for grabbing alloy rims in dry and wet conditions.

  • Non-cartridge style
  • Compatible with: DEORE XT M760 series, DEORE XT M750 series, DEORE T610 series, SHIMANO DEORE LX T660 series, SHIMANO ALIVIO M430 series, SHIMANO ALIVIO T4000 series, DXR MX70 series
name: Shimano M70T4 V-Brake Rim Brake Pads
